actions.name: List alarms
actions.description:
Lists alarms, based on the
 specified query.

responses.body:
[
 {
 "alarm_actions": [
 "http://site:8000/alarm"
 ],
 "alarm_id": null,
 "combination_rule": null,
 "description": "An alarm",
 "enabled": true,
 "insufficient_data_actions": [
 "http://site:8000/nodata"
 ],
 "name": "SwiftObjectAlarm",
 "ok_actions": [
 "http://site:8000/ok"
 ],
 "project_id": "c96c887c216949acbdfbd8b494863567",
 "repeat_actions": false,
 "state": "ok",
 "state_timestamp": "2013-11-21T12:33:08.486228",
 "threshold_rule": null,
 "timestamp": "2013-11-21T12:33:08.486221",
 "type": "threshold",
 "user_id": "c96c887c216949acbdfbd8b494863567"
 }
]

actions.name: Update alarm state
actions.description:
Sets the state of a specified
 alarm.

actions.name: Show alarm state
actions.description:
Gets the state of a specified
 alarm.

actions.name: Show alarm history
actions.description:
Assembles the history for a
 specified alarm.

actions.name: List meters
actions.description:
Lists meters, based on the data
 recorded so far.

actions.name: Show meter
actions.description:
Gets samples for a specified
 meter.

actions.name: Create meter
actions.description:
Posts list of samples to
 Telemetry.

actions.name: Show meter statistics
actions.description:
Computes the statistics of the
 samples in a specified time range.

actions.name: Show resource information
actions.description:
Gets details for a specified
 resource.
